text: @realDonaldTrump How would you know? You showed utter disrespect for an accomplished Asian American Journalist for all to see yesterday. Please stop talking. Covid-19 is here and solving the problem is more important than making sure you blame others for the problem. NO ONE SAYS YOU CAUSED IT!!!
